page.shortlink: ux viewbox builder viewbox properties selmode
page.description: The selection mode for a ViewBox that allows multiple selections.

discussion.p: If the *[ui:Allow multiple selection]* property has been enabled, the *[ui:Selection mode]* property is exposed. The *[ui:Selection mode]* defines how multiple items in the ViewBox are selected.

item.name: Default
item.description: User must ctrl-tap/ctrl-click or shift-click to select multiple entries.

item.name: Additive
item.description: Tapping or clicking an item selects it and adds it to the list of selected items. Tapping/clicking an item again deselects it.

discussion.p: This property is only shown when [Allow multiple selection] is enabled.
